.method public static hidebysig valuetype MonoTouch.OpenTK.Matrix4 CreatePerspectiveFieldOfView(float32 fovy, float32 aspect, float32 zNear, float32 zFar) cil managed

.method public static hidebysig valuetype OpenTK.Matrix4 CreatePerspectiveFieldOfView(float32 fovy, float32 aspect, float32 zNear, float32 zFar) cil managed

Docs.param: Angle of the field of view in the y direction (in radians)
Aspect ratio of the view (width / height)
Distance to the near clip plane
Distance to the far clip plane
Docs.returns: A projection matrix that transforms camera space to raster space
Docs.exception:
Thrown under the following conditions:
fovy is zero, less than zero or larger than Math.PI
aspect is negative or zero
zNear is negative or zero
zFar is negative or zero
zNear is larger than zFar
